== Kaniyarkode (CT) (627756) ==

Kaniyarkode (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 12.29 sq. km. and harbouring 3282 households with total population of 13236 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 48 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 327 km. Male population is 6455 and female population is 6781. Scheduled Caste population is 2444 and Scheduled Tribes population is 7. Census Location Code of the town is 627756<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 48 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 95 km. Railway station is at Lakkidi at a distance of 4 km.
